page.title: 15THE EURO M.P.(CONT)
page.content: at the{Liverpool-Juventus match in {Brussels in May 1985.}He thinks that the good points of being a Euro M.P are that you can meet different people visit other countries .The bad points of being a Euro M.P are being away from home,travelling in winter with fog and snow.Sometimes Mr.Megahy books meetings a year in advance.Mr.Megahy hopes politics will be here in the future and that people will not spend alot of money on weapons and try to agree with others.Mr.Megahy hopes that they can conquer unemployment and its associated problems.The important thing Mr.Megahy would change about his job is that the meeting should be in one place like Brussels.{Mr.Megahy is {deputy-leader of the British Labour {group in the E.E.C.}He is also seeking the nomination from the local Labour party for the next{General Election.
